model.chip_description: Atmel ATSAM3UxC Single-Bank Flash 100 pin Cortex-M3 MCUs http://www.atmel.com/products/microcontrollers/arm/sam3u.aspx Added by Matt Wood - mattwood2000(at)gmail.com

register.name: DMAC_CREQ
register.description: DMAC Software Chunk Transfer Request Register

register.name: DMAC_LAST
register.description: DMAC Software Last Transfer Flag Register

register.name: DMAC_EBCIER
register.description: DMAC Error, Chained Buffer Transfer Completed Interrupt and Buffer Transfer Completed Interrupt Enable register.

register.name: DMAC_EBCIDR
register.description: DMAC Error, Chained Buffer Transfer Completed Interrupt and Buffer Transfer Completed Interrupt Disable register.

register.name: DMAC_EBCIMR
register.description: DMAC Error, Chained Buffer Transfer Completed Interrupt and Buffer transfer completed Mask Register.

register.name: DMAC_EBCISR
register.description: DMAC Error, Chained Buffer Transfer Completed Interrupt and Buffer transfer completed Status Register.

register.name: PIOA_SCIFSR
register.description: System Clock Glitch Input Filter Select Register

register.name: PIOA_IFDGSR
register.description: Glitch or Debouncing Input Filter Clock Selection Status Register

register.name: PIOA_REHLSR
register.description: Rising Edge/ High Level Select Register

register.name: PIOB_SCIFSR
register.description: System Clock Glitch Input Filter Select Register

register.name: PIOB_IFDGSR
register.description: Glitch or Debouncing Input Filter Clock Selection Status Register

register.name: PIOB_REHLSR
register.description: Rising Edge/ High Level Select Register

register.name: PWM_SCUC
register.description: PWM Sync Channels Update Control Register

register.name: PWM_SCUP
register.description: PWM Sync Channels Update Period Register

register.name: PWM_SCUPUPD
register.description: PWM Sync Channels Update Period Update Register

register.name: PWM_OSSUPD
register.description: PWM Output Selection Set Update Register

register.name: PWM_OSCUPD
register.description: PWM Output Selection Clear Update Register

register.name: PWM_CDTYUPD0
register.description: PWM Channel Duty Cycle Update Register (ch_num = 0)

register.name: PWM_DTUPD0
register.description: PWM Channel Dead Time Update Register (ch_num = 0)

register.name: PWM_CDTYUPD1
register.description: PWM Channel Duty Cycle Update Register (ch_num = 1)

register.name: PWM_DTUPD1
register.description: PWM Channel Dead Time Update Register (ch_num = 1)

register.name: PWM_CDTYUPD2
register.description: PWM Channel Duty Cycle Update Register (ch_num = 2)

register.name: PWM_DTUPD2
register.description: PWM Channel Dead Time Update Register (ch_num = 2)

register.name: PWM_CDTYUPD3
register.description: PWM Channel Duty Cycle Update Register (ch_num = 3)

register.name: PWM_DTUPD3
register.description: PWM Channel Dead Time Update Register (ch_num = 3)

register.name: SMC_ADDR
register.description: SMC NFC Address Cycle Zero Register

register.name: SUPC_SMMR
register.description: Supply Controller Supply Monitor Mode Register

register.name: UDPHS_DMANXTDSC0
register.description: UDPHS DMA Next Descriptor Address Register (channel = 0)

register.name: UDPHS_DMANXTDSC1
register.description: UDPHS DMA Next Descriptor Address Register (channel = 1)

register.name: UDPHS_DMANXTDSC2
register.description: UDPHS DMA Next Descriptor Address Register (channel = 2)

register.name: UDPHS_DMANXTDSC3
register.description: UDPHS DMA Next Descriptor Address Register (channel = 3)

register.name: UDPHS_DMANXTDSC4
register.description: UDPHS DMA Next Descriptor Address Register (channel = 4)

register.name: UDPHS_DMANXTDSC5
register.description: UDPHS DMA Next Descriptor Address Register (channel = 5)
